title: Paleoclimate & Fire Regimes
description: Tree rings, pollen cores, charcoal/fire records, and drought indices for Kansas and surrounding Great Plains context. Sources include NOAA, Neotoma Paleoecology Database, and state archives.

endpoints.notes: Placeholder links for NOAA Paleoclimatology, Neotoma, and US Drought Monitor archives.

provenance: Datasets compiled from NOAA Paleoclimatology, Neotoma Paleoecology DB, Kansas Geological Survey, and local/state records.

contacts.name: NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information

notes: Charcoal/fire datasets linked to MCP experiments for paleoclimate reconstruction and fire regime modeling.
